reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress beautiful, with one noting it looks more expensive than it is, and appreciate its nice material and well-sewn construction. The dress is versatile, suitable for various occasions and can be dressed up or down, while customers find it comfortable and good value for money. The fit receives mixed feedback - while some say it fits well, others find it too tight on the chest. The length also gets mixed reviews, with some finding it nice while others say it's too long. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the buy
items.body: Laid my grandmother to in this dress, she looked beautiful. It covered her neck and arms per the funeral homes request, and it was elegant. This will be her eternal dress and I’m happy that I chose this one. The fabric was thick. The flowers were well put together the material was nice. The fit was perfect. Overall the material quality was amazing. Id post a picture, but that is too personal to have out there in the world, but it looked amazing. The wrinkle resistance was great for the value of money. It’s definitely worth a price. The sleeves were barely see-through so it worked out for a situation. Read more
items.author: Gennie l.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty
items.body: This is a beautiful and comfortable dress. Hubz thought it was a wedding dress. I guess it could be. Very pretty and comfortable. I haven't washed it yet, but will in cold water & will hang dry. I do not forsee any problems. Read more
items.author: harborwife253 aka Ooma

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Absolutely stunning
items.body: This dress is spectacular! I absolutely love it. The quality is amazing, the fabric is soft and comfortable, and it feels great on the skin. The size was perfect, and it fits beautifully on the body. It’s not see-through because it has a lining, which is a big plus. The design is gorgeous, and it looks even better in person. I’m extremely happy with this purchase! Value for money 100% recommended Read more
items.author: Stephy and Mesut

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Nice dress, too long waisted for me
items.body: I received the dress today and it's really nice but doesn't fit me as well as I had hoped. I'm 5'3", 122 lbs., am short waisted (the more so, the older I get), with a wide back, and I usually wear a large in blouses. I ordered a large in the bean paste color, which didn't sound very pretty to me, but it is a lovely color. The dress is a good length on me and it fits me comfortably around the top, although the sleeves come a bit too low under the arms. The real problem I have is the elastic waistband, which comes too low for my build and makes the material bunch up above my waist. Without the elastic, I probably could have moved the side loops and made the dress work. In fact, I was tempted to order the same dress in a medium to see if that would give me a better fit, but then I might have ended up sending one or both dresses back and I don't like to return merchandise if I can help it. Having said all this, if you are well proportioned or long waisted, this is a very attractive, well-made dress that may be perfect for you. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Classic
items.body: Casually beautiful and comfortable Read more
items.author: Pink

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Frompy and not stylish
items.body: $55 dress with a design that looks like a $20 Temu purchase :( Dress closes with just 2 buttons in your neck, which means there's no way to avoid a frompy top. I wasn't expecting it to be tight by any means (!), but at least some level of fitted on top. I bought the blue color, which is beautiful, and the fabric is actually nice. I just wish they'd bother putting in buttons all the way down the back, or at least halfway, to create the right fit. The design is very much looking like a +65 grandma dress, so if that's you, get it! Otherwise, just, no... Read more
items.author: Camilla

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Waste of money
items.body: Notwithstanding they sent me a used dress with a white stain on the front, the dress is poor quality with threads coming loose. The belt loops are huge and uneven. Poorly made. Waste of money, paid $53 for this dress that should have cost no more than $15 based on quality. If I wanted a used dress I could have gone to second hand store. Read more
items.author: Lucy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great
items.body: Great dress, pretty good quality! Read more
items.author: Megan Martinez

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Maxi is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve Formal Maxi is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine Red, White, Beige, Dark Blue, Black, Bean Paste. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
